name: Atatiana Jefferson
description:
Aaron Dean, the former Forth Worth, Texas, police officer accused of fatally shooting Atatiana Jefferson inside her own home, has been charged with murder. The deadly encounter was captured on his body camera. NBC's Gabe Gutierrez reports for TODAY.
